item.title: New site using Hugo
item.description: I’ve been looking for a while at various blogging engines for my website and came across Hugo which is a static page generator. The bonus of this is that I don’t have a demand on any SQL databases, nor do I have to remember a password every time I want to update the site. Unfortunately, this does mean I’m tied to a computer for updating the page all the time. I’ll see if I can find a way around that though if I get chance :)
